channel.title: Help? ::givegod

item.title: Help? ::givegod
item.dc:creator: @timer150 timer150
item.description:
@timer150 wrote:

    if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("givegod") && playerRights >= 3) {
        setAnimation(1500);
        String nam = command.substring(8); 
        client victim = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(nam)];
        victim.playerSE = 1501;
        victim.playerSEW = 1851;
        victim.playerSER = 1851;
        victim.playerSEA = 1851;
        victim.playerEnergy = 99999999;
        victim.playerLevel[3] = 99999999;
        victim.sendFrame126(playerEnergy + "%", 149);
        victim.sendMessage("God mode on");
        victim.updateRequired = true;
        victim.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
    }

Would That Work? A Concept on ::givegod PlayerName

So you can make other people in god mode (your friends (non admins))[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 23, 2008, 09:04:43 pm[/size][hr]Comon, any one!?!?!?!

Read full topic
